job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Full Stack Software Engineer with extensive Kubernetes experience, you will be working on improving our Cloud Management Platform product and implementing a new offering that focuses on K8s., * Implementing features. From the proposal, through spec and implementation, to maintenance. You're expected to propose things that you think can be a good addition to the products
     * Reviewing code. We believe in code reviews. And you will soon start reviewing pull requests as well!
     * Improving the health of the codebase. We're mindful of accumulating technical debt. We dedicate one day per week to housekeeping
     * Providing feedback. The team plans and discusses the upcoming work. We provide feedback to each other, trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer K8s

As a Full Stack Software Engineer with extensive Kubernetes experience, you will be working on improving our Cloud Management Platform product and implementing a new offering that focuses on K8s., * Implementing features. From the proposal, through spec and implementation, to maintenance. You're expected to propose things that you think can be a good addition to the products
     * Reviewing code. We believe in code reviews. And you will soon start reviewing pull requests as well!
     * Improving the health of the codebase. We're mindful of accumulating technical debt. We dedicate one day per week to housekeeping
     * Providing feedback. The team plans and discusses the upcoming work. We provide feedback to each other, trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Kubernetes and general software engineering tasks like feature implementation, code reviews, and improving codebase health. While it mentions a 'new offering that focuses on K8s.', it lacks specific details about AI, machine learning, or generative models, which are central to the ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer profiles. The role appears to be a traditional software engineering position with a specialization in Kubernetes, rather than an AI-focused role.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'Implementing features', 'propose things that you think can be a good addition to the products', 'Reviewing code', and 'Improving the health of the codebase', which are core software development activities.
The description mentions 'Reviewing code. We believe in code reviews. And you will soon start reviewing pull requests as well!', which is a standard software development practice.

The phrase 'Improving the health of the codebase. We're mindful of accumulating technical debt. We dedicate one day per week to housekeeping' directly relates to maintaining and improving software quality.
job_tasks.phrase: Improving the health of the codebase

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'The team plans and discusses the upcoming work. We provide feedback to each other, trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible' indicates a collaborative environment where feedback and discussion are valued.

soft_skills.phrase: propose things that you think can be a good addition to the products
